en.title: What is GreenScore?
text: GreenScore is a web application based on an engaging online questionnaire, focusing on ecological themes. Inspired by purity and personality tests, GreenScore highlights 20 questions about situations related to ecological lifestyle. By using a playful and informative approach, our goal is to raise awareness among users about the impact of their daily choices on the environment.

Each question is carefully crafted so that every user can relate to the situation, covering various aspects of daily life such as energy consumption, waste management, or modes of transportation. The objective is to provide a holistic evaluation of each individual's ecological footprint.
GreenScore is not just an online questionnaire; it's an interactive exploration of each person's impact on the planet, an invitation to awareness and commitment towards a greener future and world!

en.title: How do we measure your ecological footprint?
text: Answer our interactive questionnaire to discover how your daily choices influence the environment. From how you consume energy to your consumption habits, or through the use of products that can impact the environment.
We are here to help you become aware of your habits and identify practical ways to adopt a more environmentally friendly lifestyle.
At the end of the questionnaire, receive personalized results, ecological advice, and suggestions to amplify your positive impact.
Join us in this ecological adventure and let's explore together our potential for change to work towards a greener world! üå≥

en.title: What are the levels of GreenScore ?
text: You embody excellence in ecology, with almost impeccable habits and a remarkably positive environmental impact. Keep exploring and educating yourself to maintain this level of excellence.
You have reached a good level of ecological engagement, with environmentally friendly habits. Continue on this path to strengthen your actions and your positive impact.

You are starting to realize the importance of your impact on the environment and have already begun to adopt some environmentally friendly habits. Continue to explore and learn to deepen your ecological commitment.
You are at the beginning of your commitment to a more environmentally friendly lifestyle. Keep persevering despite the challenges and look for ways to gradually improve your ecological habits.
